scripts.wp:plugin:activate: wp-env run cli wp plugin activate edge-link-router
scripts.wp:plugin:deactivate: wp-env run cli wp plugin deactivate edge-link-router
scripts.wp:rewrite:flush: wp-env run cli wp rewrite flush
scripts.wp:db:reset: wp-env run cli wp db reset --yes
scripts.wp:db:export: wp-env run cli wp db export /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/edge-link-router/dump.sql
